oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RECIRCULATION IN SHALLOW BAYS AND RIVERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Price, R.K.
Dalrymple, R.A.
Dean, R.G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: river
shallow bay
bay
recirculation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A theoretical model is presented to provide an approximation of the water and temperature recirculation in a shallow bay, lake or river, between the outlet and inlet canals of the cooling system for a power plant In particular, a temperature recirculation factor relating the outlet and inlet temperatures is derived.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 12 (1970): Proceedings of 12th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Washington, D.C., 1970.; 110
